The Shield of the Undevout was an ornate enchanted shield that was once wielded by a blackguard and later by a death knight they became.
The Shield of the Undevout possessed a +2 protective enchantment. Additionally, it had the dreadful hewer enchantment that made the wielders spells and abilities that caused fear dramatically easy to take hold of the opponents hearts. Lastly, the shield also expanded the wielders magical capabilities, allowing them to memorize one additional simple spell of an arcane of divine nature.
In the , blackguards greaves were worn by the guardian death knight called That Which Guards, who, along with That Which Guards and That Which Lurks, guarded the entrance to the chamber of the Bhaalist Murder Tribunal in the Undercellar of Baldurs Gate.
